Hangurs: Your closet, multiplied.

Unlock and shop the closets around you,
and make a profit from your own!

About Hangurs

Shop closets in your neighborhood, rent items you want, and never pay retail prices again! Hangurs will expand your wardrobe by providing the inventory right at your fingertips. No more scrambling through malls for your last minute fashion needs. Just select, request, and enjoy!

Have a closet full of unique items? Hangurs gives you the option to rent out your own items for profit. You can make money without selling items you love, or even leaving your couch! After all, you can’t wear everything in your closet at once—so go ahead, put your closet to work.

Join Hangurs for free now and let's change the way you shop!
